keyEvents.title: The Rocketman Revealed
keyEvents.description: Kokoro reveals the Rocketman, a second sea train created by Tom's Workers. This prototype was locked away for 12 years because its speed cannot be controlled and it cannot be stopped safely.

keyEvents.title: Rocketman Departs Water 7
keyEvents.description: The Rocketman launches from Water 7 carrying the Straw Hats, Paulie, and the Franky Family (on King Bulls), heading toward Enies Lobby through the Aqua Laguna storm.

description: A prototype sea train designed by Tom's Workers. Features a cone-shaped smokebox painted to resemble a shark's head. Possesses dangerously high speeds and cannot respond to conventional brake mechanisms, making it impossible to stop or slow at will. Deemed too dangerous for regular passenger service and was locked away in the Brick Warehouse for 12 years.
historicalSignificance: Built by Tom's Workers as a prototype sea train but abandoned due to its uncontrollable nature. Reactivated by Iceburg and Kokoro to help the Straw Hats pursue CP9 to Enies Lobby.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of the Brick Warehouse
keyEvents.description: Kokoro leads Luffy, Zoro, and Chopper to the Brick Warehouse where the Rocketman has been stored for 12 years. Iceburg is already there, having prepared the train for the rescue mission.

description: A derelict warehouse in Water 7 where the Rocketman sea train was locked away for 12 years after being deemed too dangerous for public use. The warehouse served as storage for the abandoned prototype.
historicalSignificance: Storage location for the Rocketman after it was determined to be too dangerous for regular operations. The warehouse kept the train hidden until the rescue mission to Enies Lobby.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Fights Through the Train
keyEvents.description: Sanji battles his way through the Puffing Tom, defeating Marine guards as he searches for his captured crewmates.

keyEvents.title: Cart Six Discovery
keyEvents.description: Sanji discovers Usopp and Franky imprisoned in Cart Six of the Puffing Tom, which contains communication equipment.

keyEvents.title: T Bone Aboard the Puffing Tom
keyEvents.description: Marine Captain T Bone is revealed to be aboard the Puffing Tom, hearing the commotion from Sanji's battles.

geographicLocation: Sea track between Water 7 and Enies Lobby
description: The primary sea train connecting Water 7 to Enies Lobby. In this episode, it is carrying CP9 agents, captured prisoners (Robin, Franky, Usopp), and Marine forces including Captain T Bone.
historicalSignificance: The first sea train created by Tom, carrying the captured Robin and Franky to Enies Lobby for the World Government.

keyEvents.title: Departure from Water 7
keyEvents.description: The Rocketman departs Water 7 with the rescue party aboard, leaving the city behind as they head toward Enies Lobby through the Aqua Laguna storm.

description: A water metropolis and shipbuilding capital. In this episode, it serves as the launching point for the rescue mission to Enies Lobby.
historicalSignificance: The city where the Straw Hats' rescue mission to save Robin begins, with local allies providing the Rocketman.
